description: This file sets up an agent with Google Search tools to find the latest news on a given topic, and prints a response about 'Mistral AI'.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that can perform tasks using specified tools.

classes.name: GoogleSearchTools
classes.description: Provides Google Search capabilities for the agent.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response, optionally in markdown format.
